channel.title: Je ne pas parle francais - Milchmann (Trance)
channel.description:
Let's kick off the brandnew year with a brandnew track !"Je ne pas parle francais" was written while I was on a trip to new year celebrations in Munich. Enjoy and let me know what ya think :)
https://soundcloud.com/milch_mann/je-ne-pas-parle-francais-original-mix

item.title: Je ne pas parle francais - Milchmann (Trance)
item.dc:creator: Milchmann
item.description:
Thanks for listening and taking time for my work! I Love that idea! starting in the middle as you to the near end could be a cool build up. but there the drums fade out at the end - and then from the beginning they start building up again. do you mean by “and the beginning to the 4min mark” to put the part from 1:30 when she starts singing the verse at the end ?

Read full topic
item.source: Je ne pas parle francais - Milchmann (Trance)

item.title: Je ne pas parle francais - Milchmann (Trance)
item.dc:creator: Vveerrgg
item.description:
SOLID! Definitely would be playable… but… but… if you want to make it a grinder. Start the track at the 4min mark to the end and the beginning to the 4min mark. Jeez… I think that would melt a dancefloor.

EDIT: I just hand bombed it on SoundCloud. Face Melting !!! Seriously… somewheee in that 4:10 area. To the end’ish and the start. F’me that is a strong tune.

EDIT2: start at the 3:47 till somewhere near the end and then to the start WOW

Read full topic
item.source: Je ne pas parle francais - Milchmann (Trance)

item.title: Je ne pas parle francais - Milchmann (Trance)
item.dc:creator: Milchmann
item.source: Je ne pas parle francais - Milchmann (Trance)

item.title: Je ne pas parle francais - Milchmann (Trance)
item.dc:creator: Milchmann
item.description:
Yeah! I published a couple of tracks last year with a service I forgot their name, they push it to all major Platforms ink. Apple Music and Beatport. I will definitely put it there, but i’m Of your Optionen - the shorter edit was more like a radio cut to me, while a little EP or something needs the longer version including the vocals. Thx for your feedback, I really appreciate!

Read full topic
item.source: Je ne pas parle francais - Milchmann (Trance)

item.title: Je ne pas parle francais - Milchmann (Trance)
item.dc:creator: Vveerrgg
item.description:
Went back and listened to the first one you posted… somewhere between those two versions is a real floor stormer!!! The second version is definitely the Spotify worthy version … and that first version with a revisit could definitely be a vinyl only release! It’s got that grind that you need in a good 6 min track. Sprinkle in the vocals and keep the grind … hot fire!

Read full topic
item.source: Je ne pas parle francais - Milchmann (Trance)

item.title: Je ne pas parle francais - Milchmann (Trance)
item.dc:creator: Vveerrgg
item.description:
Wow. Thank you for taking the time to revisit this. Great work. It’s definitely pumping now. Not sure what your next steps are with it. But you definitely cracked the code on making a solid tune.

Have you thought about putting on Spotify? Just to see if it might find an audience? Sometimes it’s worth the effort just to see where it goes. Maybe use http://Amuse.io or something. Just to see

Read full topic
item.source: Je ne pas parle francais - Milchmann (Trance)

I produced an edit with some really cool vocals and some extra switched out kicks
https://soundcloud.com/milch_mann/je-ne-pas-parle-francais-edit-with-faden

item.title: Je ne pas parle francais - Milchmann (Trance)
item.dc:creator: Vveerrgg
item.description:
Thats a smooth tune…

odd suggestion… but what would you think about switching out the kick (or doubling up 2 kicks) here and there in the track. Just as a way keep modulating the energy of the tune.

Just a suggestion… its still a solid tune
